enrollment.title: Online Enrollment Process for Current Students

step.title: Log In to Your Account
step.description: Log in to your personal guardian account on the school's enrollment portal.

step.title: Fill Out the Online Enrollment Form
step.description: Complete the digital enrollment form with your child's updated personal and academic information, then submit it.

step.title: Pay Enrollment Fee
step.description: Settle the enrollment fee via the online payment option or pay in person at the school's cashier.

step.title: Wait for Approval
step.description: Wait for confirmation of your child's enrollment through your account or registered email address.
